languages.text: [draft]Every use of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} increases the Psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against ranged attacks by +5 until the start of the Psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [draft]Every use of a psychic power increases the Psyker's Agility and dodge against ranged attacks by +5 until the start of the Psyker's next turn.
